data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Saint Thomas.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S.
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 36,036 people in the state of Saint Thomas who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S. the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: There are 51,600 people living in the state of Saint Thomas. Only about 12,577 might be believers.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bayamón
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bayamón, Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S..
Father, help the 12,577 believers in Saint Thomas to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 39,022 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, help your children in Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S. find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Saint Thomas to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Saint Thomas
location.cities_list: Bayamón, Carolina, Guaynabo, Trujillo Alto, Cataño
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bayamón (203,499), Carolina (170,404), Guaynabo (81,360), Trujillo Alto (54,189), Cataño (28,093)
